SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.ui

Class UiKit

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.ui.UiKit
public final class UiKit extends Object
Lightweight UI toolkit: provides (1) simple BitmapFont scaling; (2) rounded rectangle backgrounds with optional borders. Does not depend on external skin/ttf files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont
    font(int size, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
    Generates a scaled BitmapFont (without TTF dependency).
    static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Drawable
    roundRect(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fillColor, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color borderColor, int cornerRadius, int borderWidth)
    Generates a rounded rectangle background (with optional border), returns a Drawable that can be used directly with Table.setBackground(drawable).

  • Method Details

    • font

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont font(int size, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      Generates a scaled BitmapFont (without TTF dependency).
      Parameters:
      size - target font size in pixels (internally scales based on 16px baseline)
      color - font color (you can also set fontColor in LabelStyle)

    • roundRect

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Drawable roundRect(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color fillColor, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color borderColor, int cornerRadius, int borderWidth)
      Generates a rounded rectangle background (with optional border), returns a Drawable that can be used directly with Table.setBackground(drawable). Does not use NinePatch to avoid constructor parameter issues.
      Parameters:
      fillColor - fill color (with transparency)
      borderColor - border color; if null or borderWidth less than or equal to 0, no border will be drawn
      cornerRadius - corner radius in pixels
      borderWidth - border width in pixels
